alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:20PM CDT until August 20 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MARSHALL COUNTY... At 220 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lacon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Henry around 230 PM CDT. Varna around 235 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include La Rose, Lake Wildwood, Marshall-Putnam County Fairgrounds, Marshall County Airport and Hopewell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
